item.title: Spacetime-Craft: An Archaeology of Visions and Explorations of Spatial Experience
item.description: Miltiadis, Constantinos. ‘Spacetime-Craft: An Archaeology of Visions and Explorations of Spatial Experience’. In Bildhafte Räume, Begehbare Bilder, edited by Kassandra Nakas and Philipp Reinfeld, 149–65. Architektur Der Medien – Medien Der Architektur 2. Paderborn, Germany: Brill | Fink, 2022. https://doi.org/10.30965/9783846767238_011.

item.title: Beyond the Visual - A research curriculum for explorations in spatiotemporal environments
item.description: Miltiadis, Constantinos, and Gerriet K. Sharma. ‘Beyond the Visual - A Research Curriculum for Explorations in Spatiotemporal Environments’. Journal for Artistic Research, no. 24 (27 September 2021). https://www.researchcatalogue.net/view/815001/815002.
